Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class LobbiesListController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.LobbiesListController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEventHandler, MainEventHandler, UI
public class LobbiesListController extends Controller
Allows a player to visualize all available lobbies.

    • handleLobbiesEvent

      public void handleLobbiesEvent(List<LobbyInfo> lobbies)
      If player was joining a lobby, it allows him to join. Otherwise, it makes it possible for the player to update current view of lists, by enabling a button.
